original_text: Should we again break thy commandments, and join in affinity with the people of these abominations? wouldest not thou be angry with us till thou hadst consumed us, so that there should be no remnant nor escaping?
korean_text: 우리가 어찌 다시 주의 계명을 거역하고 이 가증한 백성들과 통혼하오리이까 그리하면 주께서 어찌 우리를 멸하시고 남아 피할 자가 없도록 진노하시지 아니하시리이까

sentences.original_text: Should we again break thy commandments
and join in affinity with the people of these abominations?
wouldest not thou be angry with us
so that there should be no remnant nor escaping?
